title: Physics Lab
subtitle: Interactive Physics Experiments
description: Learn physics through fun interactive simulations. Explore gravity, magnetism, electricity, light, and sound!

gravity.title: Gravity & Motion
gravity.description: See how gravity affects falling objects
gravity.info: Gravity is the force that attracts objects toward each other. On Earth, gravity accelerates objects at 9.8 m/s².

magnetism.title: Magnetism
magnetism.info: Magnets have two poles (North and South) that create magnetic fields. Opposite poles attract, while like poles repel.

electricity.title: Electricity
electricity.description: Learn about voltage, current, and resistance
electricity.info: Ohm's Law states that Current (I) = Voltage (V) / Resistance (R). Higher voltage or lower resistance increases current flow.

light.title: Light & Shadow
light.info: Light travels in straight lines. When blocked by an object, it creates a shadow. The angle of light affects shadow length.

sound.title: Sound Waves
sound.info: Sound travels in waves. Frequency (measured in Hz) determines pitch, while amplitude determines volume.
